description.block.create.acacia_window: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.acacia_window_p: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.adjustable_chai: The Adjustable Chain Gearshift functions similarly to Encased Chain Drive, but can change the speed of the output with a redstone input.
description.block.create.analog_lever: Create adds multiple blocks that allow for a finer control over basic Redstone.
description.block.create.andesite_casing: Casings are blocks used throughout many crafting recipes in Create, as well as for decoration and aesthetic purposes.
description.block.create.andesite_funnel: The Andesite Funnel is used to extract or insert materials into inventories, similar in nature to the Brass Funnel.
description.block.create.andesite_ladder: Like normal Ladders, they can be climbed while on Contraptions.
description.block.create.andesite_pillar: Andesite is used as an important material in machine crafting, and can also be cut into new decorative blocks.
description.block.create.andesite_tunnel: A decorative Tunnel for Mechanical Belts.
description.block.create.asurine: Asurine is a decorative block in Create, named after its Azure color.
description.block.create.asurine_pillar: Asurine is a decorative block in Create, named after its Azure color.
description.block.create.basin: The Basin is a block that holds items and fluids used in Packing, Compacting, and Mixing recipes.
description.block.create.birch_window: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.birch_window_pa: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.blaze_burner: A Blaze Burner is a heating component that is required for certain Mixing recipes.
description.block.create.brass_block: The Block of Brass is a metal block.
description.block.create.brass_casing: Casings are blocks used throughout many crafting recipes in Create, as well as for decoration and aesthetic purposes.
description.block.create.brass_funnel: The Brass Funnel is a block that can extract or insert items into inventories, much like the Andesite Funnel.
description.block.create.brass_ladder: Like normal Ladders, they can be climbed while on Contraptions.
description.block.create.brass_tunnel: The Brass Tunnel is a machine that can only be placed on Mechanical Belts.
description.block.create.cart_assembler: The Cart Assembler can attach a Contraption to carts that pass through it when supplied with a Redstone signal.
description.block.create.chocolate: Chocolate is a fluid used to create the Bar of Chocolate.
description.block.create.chute: Chutes transport items vertically, similarly to Mechanical Belts.
description.block.create.clockwork_beari: The Clockwork Bearing is an advanced version of the Mechanical Bearing for rotating up to two clock hands according to the current in-game time.
description.block.create.clutch: The Clutch stops outgoing rotation when a redstone signal is applied.
description.block.create.cogwheel: The Cogwheel is a basic mechanical component in Create that relays rotation.
description.block.create.content_observe: The Content Observer is a machine that emits a redstone signal dependent on the items inside a container or on a Mechanical Belt.
description.block.create.controller_rail: Controller Rails are used to control the speed of Minecarts or Minecart Contraptions.
description.block.create.controls: Train Controls are required in the creation of Trains.
description.block.create.copper_backtank: The Copper Backtank carries pressurized air.
description.block.create.copper_casing: Casings are blocks used throughout many crafting recipes in Create, as well as for decoration and aesthetic purposes.
description.block.create.copper_ladder: Like normal Ladders, they can be climbed while on Contraptions.
description.block.create.copper_shingles: This article is about the block.
description.block.create.copper_tiles: This article is about the block.
description.block.create.copper_valve_ha: The Valve Handle functions much like the Hand Crank, though it only does a quarter rotation at a time.
description.block.create.creative_crate: The Creative Crate is a creative-only block that can output a specified item infinitely.
description.block.create.creative_fluid_: A Creative-only block that outputs a specified fluid infinitely.
description.block.create.creative_motor: The Creative Motor is a block used for power generation.
description.block.create.crimsite: Crimsite is a decorative block added by Create, named after its crimson color.
description.block.create.crimsite_pillar: Crimsite is a decorative block added by Create, named after its crimson color.
description.block.create.crimson_window: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.crimson_window_: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.crushing_wheel: Crushing Wheels are the more advanced version of the Millstone.
description.block.create.cuckoo_clock: The Cuckoo Clock is a block that displays in-game time.
description.block.create.cut_andesite: Andesite is used as an important material in machine crafting, and can also be cut into new decorative blocks.
description.block.create.cut_andesite_br: Andesite is used as an important material in machine crafting, and can also be cut into new decorative blocks.
description.block.create.cut_asurine: Asurine is a decorative block in Create, named after its Azure color.
description.block.create.cut_asurine_bri: Asurine is a decorative block in Create, named after its Azure color.
description.block.create.cut_crimsite: Crimsite is a decorative block added by Create, named after its crimson color.
description.block.create.cut_scoria_stai: Stairs are blocks that allow mobs and players to change elevation without jumping.
description.block.create.dark_oak_window: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.deployer: The Deployer simulates player actions on blocks or entities exactly 2 blocks away from it.
description.block.create.depot: The Depot is used as an interaction point for machines such as the Mechanical Arm.
description.block.create.diorite_pillar: Diorite is a decorative vanilla block.
description.block.create.display_board: Display Boards are a scalable alternative to the Sign.
description.block.create.display_link: A Display Link is used to get information from a block and send it to blocks that can display it.
description.block.create.encased_chain_d: The Encased Chain Drive is a block that can transfer rotation much like the Mechanical Belt.
description.block.create.encased_fan: The Encased Fan is a mechanical component that can create air streams.
description.block.create.fluid_pipe: Fluid Pipes are blocks used to transport and deal with fluids.
description.block.create.fluid_tank: The Fluid Tank is a fluid storage mechanism that can store up to 8 buckets (displayed as 8,000 mB in-game) of fluid per block.
description.block.create.fluid_valve: Fluid Pipes are blocks used to transport and deal with fluids.
description.block.create.flywheel: The Flywheel is a decorative block, previously used in tandem with Furnace Engines to create power.
description.block.create.framed_glass: Framed Glass is a decorative variant of Glass The texture of Framed Glass will connect to adjacent Framed Glass.
description.block.create.framed_glass_do: Framed Glass Doors are sliding doors with special functions on Contraptions.
description.block.create.framed_glass_pa: Framed Glass is a decorative variant of Glass The texture of Framed Glass will connect to adjacent Framed Glass.
description.block.create.framed_glass_tr: The Framed Glass Trapdoor is a trapdoor which are used to see through using glass.
description.block.create.gantry_carriage: The Gantry Carriage is a block that can move Contraptions along Gantry Shafts.
description.block.create.gantry_shaft: The Gantry Carriage is a block that can move Contraptions along Gantry Shafts.
description.block.create.gearbox: The Gearbox is a block used to transfer Rotational power.
description.block.create.gearshift: The Gearshift reverses outgoing Rotational Force when a Redstone signal is applied.
description.block.create.granite_pillar: Granite is a decorative vanilla block.
description.block.create.hand_crank: The Hand Crank generates a small amount of Rotational Force through player interaction.
description.block.create.haunted_bell: The Haunted Bell is a block that highlights mob spawnable spots when held or rang.
description.block.create.honey: Honey is a fluid used to create the Honeyed Apple.
description.block.create.horizontal_fram: Framed Glass is a decorative variant of Glass The texture of Framed Glass will connect to adjacent Framed Glass.
Framed Glass is a decorative variant of Glass The texture of Framed Glass will connect to adjacent Framed Glass.
description.block.create.hose_pulley: The Hose Pulley lets down a hose that can drain bodies of liquids.
description.block.create.item_drain: The Item Drain drains fluid from items such as buckets and bottles inserted onto it.
description.block.create.item_vault: By default, each Item Vault block has a storage space of 20 stacks, and this can be changed in the Config.
description.block.create.jungle_window: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.jungle_window_p: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.large_cogwheel: The Cogwheel is a basic mechanical component in Create that relays rotation.
description.block.create.layered_andesit: Andesite is used as an important material in machine crafting, and can also be cut into new decorative blocks.
description.block.create.layered_diorite: Diorite is a decorative vanilla block.
description.block.create.layered_granite: Granite is a decorative vanilla block.
description.block.create.layered_limesto: Limestone is a block of Rock.
description.block.create.layered_scoria: Scoria is a decorative stone block added by Create, named after its burnt, scorched appearance.
description.block.create.limestone: Limestone is a block of Rock.
description.block.create.limestone_pilla: Limestone is a block of Rock.
description.block.create.linear_chassis: The Linear Chassis is one method of connecting up Contraptions.
description.block.create.mechanical_arm: The Mechanical Arm is a block used to transfer items.
description.block.create.mechanical_bear: The Mechanical Bearing is meant to create and rotate moving structures.
description.block.create.mechanical_craf: Mechanical Crafters are machines that can automatically craft items.
description.block.create.mechanical_dril: The Mechanical Drill is a block used to break blocks.
description.block.create.mechanical_harv: The Mechanical Harvester is a component used on Contraptions to harvest crops.
description.block.create.mechanical_mixe: The Mechanical Mixer is a mechanical component that applies Mixing recipes and shapeless Crafting recipes to items in Basins.
description.block.create.mechanical_pist: The Mechanical Piston is a piston that can push Contraptions when powered with Rotational Power.
description.block.create.mechanical_plou: The Mechanical Plough is a component used to break non-collidable blocks The Plough can only be placed on the horizontal face of a solid block, however, this block is not necessary to support the Plough after it is placed.
description.block.create.mechanical_pres: The Mechanical Press is a mechanical component that applies Pressing, Packing, and Compacting recipes to items below it.
description.block.create.mechanical_pump: Fluid Pipes are blocks used to transport and deal with fluids.
description.block.create.mechanical_saw: Mechanical Saws are powered through rotational force, and when placed down facing to the side they will automatically chop down wood blocks in front of them.
description.block.create.metal_bracket: Brackets are decorative items used on Shafts, Cogwheels, and Fluid Pipes.
description.block.create.metal_girder: Metal Girders are a decorative block.
description.block.create.millstone: The Millstone is a more basic equivalent of the Crushing Wheels, and is most likely the first of the two that the Player will construct.
description.block.create.mysterious_cuck: The Cuckoo Clock is a block that displays in-game time.
description.block.create.nixie_tube: The Nixie Tube is a block that can display text or numbers.
description.block.create.nozzle: A Nozzle distributes the effect of an Encased Fan in all directions.
description.block.create.oak_window: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.oak_window_pane: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.ochrum: Ochrum is a decorative block added by Create, named after its ochre color.
description.block.create.ornate_iron_win: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.peculiar_bell: The Peculiar Bell is a decorative block that is also used to create the Haunted Bell.
description.block.create.piston_extensio: The Piston Extension Pole is an extension for the Mechanical Piston When placed on the back of a Mechanical Piston, the Piston Extension Pole will increase the maximum distance the piston can extend.
description.block.create.placard: The Placard is a decorative block used to display items.
description.block.create.portable_fluid_: The Portable Fluid Interface is the fluid version of the Portable Storage Interface.
description.block.create.portable_storag: The Portable Storage Interface is a block that allows Item Transporters to directly interact with Contraption inventories.
description.block.create.powered_latch: Create adds multiple blocks that allow for a finer control over basic Redstone.
description.block.create.powered_toggle_: Create adds multiple blocks that allow for a finer control over basic Redstone.
description.block.create.pulse_extender: Create adds multiple blocks that allow for a finer control over basic Redstone.
description.block.create.pulse_repeater: Create adds multiple blocks that allow for a finer control over basic Redstone.
description.block.create.radial_chassis: The Radial Chassis is a block used to connect Contraptions.
description.block.create.railway_casing: Casings are blocks used throughout many crafting recipes in Create, as well as for decoration and aesthetic purposes.
description.block.create.raw_zinc_block: Zinc is a material found in the overworld.
description.block.create.redstone_contac: Redstone Contacts allow Contraptions to convey redstone signals.
description.block.create.redstone_link: Create adds multiple blocks that allow for a finer control over basic Redstone.
description.block.create.refined_radianc: Casings are blocks used throughout many crafting recipes in Create, as well as for decoration and aesthetic purposes.
description.block.create.rope_pulley: The Rope Pulley creates Contraptions much like a Mechanical Piston, but in only one direction and without the need for Piston Extension Poles.
description.block.create.rose_quartz_lam: The lamp can be activated with a redstone pulse.
description.block.create.rose_quartz_til: The Rose Quartz Block, Rose Quartz Tiles, and Small Rose Quartz Tiles are decorative blocks made from Rose Quartz and Polished Rose Quartz.
description.block.create.rotation_speed_: The Rotation Speed Controller is a mechanical component that allows the player to precisely control rotational speed.
description.block.create.sail_frame: The Sail is a block used to create a Windmill.
description.block.create.schematic_table: A Schematic And Quill is used to save blueprints of a structure.
description.block.create.schematicannon: The Schematicannon is a special type of machine used to build structures with the use of Schematics.
description.block.create.scorchia: Scorchia is a decorative variant of Scoria, named after its ashy, scorched coloration.
description.block.create.scoria: Scoria is a decorative stone block added by Create, named after its burnt, scorched appearance.
description.block.create.scoria_pillar: Scoria is a decorative stone block added by Create, named after its burnt, scorched appearance.
description.block.create.secondary_linea: The Linear Chassis is one method of connecting up Contraptions.
description.block.create.sequenced_gears: The Sequenced Gearshift allows finer control over Rotational power, allowing multiple changes to the rotation over a period of time.
description.block.create.shadow_steel_ca: The Shadow Casing is a block with no current function other than decoration.
description.block.create.shaft: The shaft is a basic mechanical component in Create.
description.block.create.small_rose_quar: The Rose Quartz Block, Rose Quartz Tiles, and Small Rose Quartz Tiles are decorative blocks made from Rose Quartz and Polished Rose Quartz.
description.block.create.smart_chute: Chutes transport items vertically, similarly to Mechanical Belts.
description.block.create.smart_fluid_pip: Fluid Pipes are blocks used to transport and deal with fluids.
description.block.create.speedometer: The Speedometer measures the speed of Rotational Force.
description.block.create.spout: The Spout is a block used for filling liquid containers such as bottles or buckets, or crafting with liquids.
description.block.create.spruce_window: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.spruce_window_p: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.steam_engine: The Steam Engine is a block meant to provide Rotational Force, and has the highest Stress capacity compared to the other generating blocks.
description.block.create.steam_whistle: The Steam Whistle is a musical block activated by redstone.
description.block.create.sticker: The Sticker is used to stick and unstick things to moving Contraptions.
description.block.create.stockpile_switc: The Stockpile Switch measures how full an inventory is and can emit a Redstone signal at adjustable thresholds.
description.block.create.stressometer: The Stressometer is used to measure the amount of Stress on a Shaft.
description.block.create.tiled_glass: Tiled Glass is a decorative variant of Glass Tiled Glass can be used in recipes added by Create which normally use Glass.
description.block.create.tiled_glass_pan: Tiled Glass is a decorative variant of Glass Tiled Glass can be used in recipes added by Create which normally use Glass.
description.block.create.track: Train Tracks are special blocks used to support Trains.
description.block.create.track_observer: The Train Observer is used to detect passing Trains.
description.block.create.track_signal: Train Signals are used to control the flow of Trains not driven by players.
description.block.create.track_station: Train Stations are used to create, disassemble, and guide Trains.
description.block.create.train_door: Train Doors are sliding doors with special functions on Contraptions.
description.block.create.turntable: The Turntable is a block which can rotate and is used to craft Bearings.
description.block.create.veridium: Veridium is a decorative block added by Create, named after its green coloration.
description.block.create.vertical_framed: Framed Glass is a decorative variant of Glass The texture of Framed Glass will connect to adjacent Framed Glass.

description.block.create.warped_window_p: Windows are decorative blocks with vertical connected textures.
description.block.create.water_wheel: The Water Wheel is a source of rotational power.
description.block.create.weighted_ejecto: The Weighted Ejector flings items and entities to a targeted block up to 32 blocks away.
description.block.create.windmill_bearin: The Windmill Bearing is a block used for power generation.
description.block.create.wooden_bracket: Brackets are decorative items used on Shafts, Cogwheels, and Fluid Pipes.
description.block.create.zinc_block: This article is about the block.
description.block.create.zinc_ore: Zinc Ore is a mineral block found underground.
description.enchantment.create.capacity: The Potato Cannon is a weapon that shoots food.
description.enchantment.create.potato_re: The Potato Cannon is a weapon that shoots food.

description.entity.create.seat: Seats are used to allow multiple entities to ride a Contraption.
description.entity.create.super_glue: Super Glue holds structures in Contraptions together.
description.fluid.create.tea: A potion that restores a single hunger point and grants the drinker haste for 3 minutes.
description.item.create.andesite_alloy: Andesite Alloy is a material used in Andesite Casing and simple kinetic blocks, which serves as an entry-point to the mechanical components of Create.
description.item.create.attribute_filter: Most machines have a built in filter used to determine how they treat inputs.
description.item.create.bar_of_chocolate: A Bar of Chocolate is a Food item.
description.item.create.belt_connector: A Mechanical Belt is a mechanical component that conveys rotation and moves items and entities.

description.item.create.blaze_cake_base: Blaze Cake is an item that can be fed to a Blaze Burner in order to make it Super-Heated.
description.item.create.brass_hand: The Brass Hand is an item that is only used in crafting recipes.
description.item.create.brass_ingot: The Brass Ingot is often used in any component capable of item sorting.
description.item.create.brass_nugget: Brass is an alloy obtained by mixing Copper and Zinc together with a Mechanical Mixer, Basin, and Blaze Burner.

description.item.create.chocolate_glazed: Chocolate Glazed Berries are a food item.
description.item.create.chromatic_compou: Chromatic Compound is a material used to create Shadow Steel and Refined Radiance.
description.item.create.cinder_flour: Cinder Flour is primarily used as an ingredient in the process of making Blaze Cakes, as well as in making various vanilla powders.
description.item.create.copper_backtank: The Copper Backtank carries pressurized air.
description.item.create.copper_nugget: The Copper Nugget is a nugget used to craft Copper Ingots.
description.item.create.copper_sheet: Sheets are used in multiple crafting recipes.
description.item.create.crafter_slot_cov: Crafter Slot Covers are used to denote empty spaces in Mechanical Crafter setups.
description.item.create.crafting_bluepri: Crafting Blueprint is a block that allows you to save crafting recipes and auto craft them easily.
description.item.create.creative_blaze_c: The Creative Blaze Cake gives infinite fuel to Blaze Burners and allows the user to cycle through their states.
description.item.create.crushed_copper_o: Crushed Ores are obtained from crushing various items.

description.item.create.crushed_zinc_ore: Crushed Ores are obtained from crushing various items.
description.item.create.diving_boots: Diving Gear is used with Copper Backtank for underwater mobility.
description.item.create.diving_helmet: Diving Gear is used with Copper Backtank for underwater mobility.
description.item.create.dough: Dough is used to make Bread and Slime.
description.item.create.electron_tube: The Electron Tube is an item that is only used in crafting recipes.
description.item.create.empty_blaze_burn: A Blaze Burner is a heating component that is required for certain Mixing recipes.
description.item.create.empty_schematic: A Schematic And Quill is used to save blueprints of a structure.
description.item.create.experience_nugge: Nuggets of Experience have a 75% chance of outputting from ore crushing recipes.

description.item.create.filter: Most machines have a built in filter used to determine how they treat inputs.
description.item.create.goggles: Engineer's Goggles are a wearable item that allow the user to see more details about placed machines.
description.item.create.golden_sheet: Sheets are used in multiple crafting recipes.
description.item.create.handheld_worldsh: A Creative Worldshaper can Place, Merge and Attach Blocks.
description.item.create.honey_bucket: A Honey Bucket is a Bucket filled with Honey.

description.item.create.linked_controlle: The Linked Controller is a remote control for Redstone Links.
description.item.create.minecart_contrap: The Cart Assembler can attach a Contraption to carts that pass through it when supplied with a Redstone signal.
description.item.create.minecart_couplin: Minecart Coupling is used to make minecart or minecart contraption trains.
description.item.create.polished_rose_qu: Polished Rose Quartz is an important crafting material used in the production of Electron Tubes.
description.item.create.potato_cannon: The Potato Cannon is a weapon that shoots food.
description.item.create.powdered_obsidia: Powdered Obsidian is a material used to create Sturdy Sheet.
description.item.create.precision_mechan: The Precision Mechanism is one of many Crafting Components.
description.item.create.propeller: The Brass Hand, the Electron Tube, the Precision Mechanism, the Propeller, and the Whisk are all items which function solely as ingredients in crafting recipes for advanced mechanical components.
description.item.create.raw_zinc: Zinc is a material found in the overworld.
description.item.create.red_sand_paper: Sand Paper is a tool used solely to create Polished Rose Quartz.
description.item.create.refined_radiance: Refined Radiance is a material used to craft the Wand Of Symmetry.
description.item.create.rose_quartz: Rose Quartz is a material used to create Polished Rose Quartz and the Rose Quartz Block.
description.item.create.sand_paper: Sand Paper is a tool used solely to create Polished Rose Quartz.
description.item.create.schedule: Train Schedules are used to instruct non-player Train conductors.
description.item.create.schematic: A Schematic And Quill is used to save blueprints of a structure.
description.item.create.schematic_and_qu: A Schematic And Quill is used to save blueprints of a structure.
description.item.create.shadow_steel: Shadow Steel is a material used to craft Shadow Casing.
description.item.create.sturdy_sheet: Sturdy Sheets are a crafting component.
description.item.create.super_glue: Super Glue holds structures in Contraptions together.
description.item.create.sweet_roll: The Sweet Roll is a food item made from bread and milk.
description.item.create.tree_fertilizer: Tree Fertilizer is used to force a Sapling to grow.
description.item.create.vertical_gearbox: The Gearbox is a block used to transfer Rotational power.
description.item.create.wand_of_symmetry: The Wand Of Symmetry is a helpful building tool that mirrors blocks placed.
description.item.create.wheat_flour: Wheat Flour is a middle item in the crafting process of Dough.
description.item.create.whisk: The Brass Hand, the Electron Tube, the Precision Mechanism, the Propeller, and the Whisk are all items which function solely as ingredients in crafting recipes for advanced mechanical components.
description.item.create.wrench: The Wrench is a tool used to rotate, dismantle and configure components Right clicking a component with the Wrench will rotate the component toward or away the face with which you interacted.
description.item.create.zinc_ingot: The Zinc Ingot is an ingot used to create Brass Ingots.
